content.text:
# Ministry of Agriculture (Chile)

The Ministry of Agriculture () is an institution in charge of the agriculture and livestock in Chile. It was created in 1924 under the name of Ministry of Agriculture, Industry and Colonization; its current name was established in 1930.
Since August 2025, Ignacia Fernández Gatica is the current minister.
